data.title: Therapeutic Horses of Saratoga, Inc.
data.text:
Hello! My name is Tyler Frame and for my birthday this year I’d like to invite my friends and family to help me celebrate by considering a gift toward a cause that I care about, Therapeutic Horses of Saratoga (THS). If you know me at all, you know that I love...

Horses, Health & History - Join us on May 30th! Do you remember the first time you saw one of these signs around Saratoga Springs? If you were born and raised here, I'll offer you a pass, but I invite those of you who consciously moved to the Saratoga...

FOR IMMEDIATE RELEASE Contact: Meg Koloskie, megan@thsaratoga.org, T. 702 379 4098 “Embrace the Belmont” comes to the National Museum of Racing and Hall of Fame on Tuesday, June 4th Kicking off a historic week of Thoroughbred racing in Saratoga Springs, this...

Horses bring us all together. This is a phrase that I find myself repeating just about every day with gratitude and a good measure of incredulity. I think that among the equine’s many talents, this gift may truly be their greatest “Super Power”. I’ve witnessed it...

Spring is here (and it brought a little snow too)! Here at the THS farm, the impact of setting our clocks forward has had a pretty powerful impact. Although the weather is chilly, with 8 inches of snow on the ground as I write this post, the shift in daylight...

Spring is in the air (and in the puddles)! Here in upstate New York, that means that Mud Season is here in all its glory. Our milder than usual winter has brought less snow and more rain over the past few weeks, and it makes for a spectacularly soggy situation at...

While February is a month that is firmly seated in the depths of winter, it still brings glimmers of spring on the horizon. The sun stays out a little longer each day and is getting stronger and higher in the sky. With anticipation of the next season moving closer, February is perfect month to celebrate love and hope. We have an abundance of both love and hope to celebrate at this time, and we hope the same is true for all of you.

Happy Leap Year! As we look at the calendar, it’s amazing to see March peeking at us around the corner. If you look closely, you’ll see that this year we enjoy the gift of an “extra day” - February 29th - which only happens on the Leap Year. Here at Therapeutic...
